languages.text: The Space Marine's {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is decreased by −{uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}. traits.locale_text: The Space Marine's recoil is decreased by −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>. languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Отдача{/g} оружия космодесантника уменьшена на {uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}. Его атаки {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} также накладывают эффект {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломления{/g} на цели, если те не проходят проверку Выносливости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}.
languages.original_text: The Space Marine's {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is decreased by −{uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}. The Space Marine's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} also apply {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} on the targets if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944} penalty.

languages.text: Le recul du Space Marine est {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}réduit{/g} de −{uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}. Les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} du Space Marine appliquent également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} aux cibles si elles échouent à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'Endurance avec une pénalité de −{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} des Space Marines wird um −{uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944} reduziert. Die {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} des Space Marines belegen das Ziel außerdem mit {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}, wenn dessen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf Zähigkeit mit einem Abzug von −{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944} misslingt.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} des Space Marines wird um -{uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944} reduziert. Die {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} des Space Marines belegen das Ziel außerdem mit {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}, wenn dessen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf Zähigkeit mit einem Abzug von -{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944} misslingt.

languages.text: スペースマリーンの{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}が−{uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}減少する。スペースマリーンの{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}は、ターゲットが−{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}のペナルティで耐久力{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態を付与する。
languages.original_text: The Space Marine's {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is decreased by −{uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}. The Space Marine's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} also apply {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} on the targets if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944} penalty.

traits.locale_text: スペースマリーンの{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}が−{uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}減少する。スペースマリーンの{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}は、ターゲットが−{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}のペナルティで耐久力{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態を付与する。

languages.text: 星际战士的{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}降低{uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}点。当星际战士进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，目标需要进行坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中中承受-{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}减值。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态。

The Space Marine's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} also apply {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} on the targets if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944} penalty.

traits.locale_text: 星际战士的{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}降低{uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}点。当星际战士进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，目标需要进行坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中中承受-{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}减值。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} del Marine Espacial se reduce en −{uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}. Los ataques {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del Marine Espacial también aplican {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} a los objetivos que no superen una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Resistencia con una penalización de −{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}.
languages.original_text: The Space Marine's {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is decreased by −{uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}. The Space Marine's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} also apply {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} on the targets if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944} penalty.

traits.locale_text: El retroceso del Marine Espacial se reduce en −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g})</u>. Los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo del Marine Espacial también aplican {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} a los objetivos que no superen una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −<u>(3 × bonificación por FUE)</u>.
